name: concept
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: The concept of free speech is unknown to them.
example.egtrans: 他们没有言论自由的概念。

example.eg: It is very difficult to define the concept of beauty.
example.egtrans: 很难给美这个概念下一个定义。

example.eg: I failed to grasp the film's central concept.
example.egtrans: 我没理解这部电影的中心思想。

example.eg: Kleenbrite is a whole new concept in toothpaste!
example.egtrans: Kleenbrite 是牙膏生产领域的一个全新概念！

phrase.phrase_title: not have any concept/have no concept of sth

example.eg: I don't think you have any concept of the pain you have caused her.
example.egtrans: 我觉得你对自己给她造成的痛苦根本就一无所知。
